text: Regarding roadmap, yes accessibility in every aspect of HubSpot is something we care about, and are actively striving to improve. At this time I have nothing specific to announce. Developer facing changes will be shared through our developer changelog <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>
yeah they seem to fall under the too good to be true category
Awesome thanks both. And Will I'll look into the boilerplate example

Anyone else been having issues with the Design Manager lately? This has been happening to me off and on and is really frustrating that I keep getting this error. If I open up a template, all the available modules (not the ones in the template) are missing and I can't do anything.
Yes, I've seen that a couple of times in the past hour or two, I haven't paid it much attention though since I'm working locally!
